channel.title: Changing Item Colors
channel.description: I know how to change item colors but i just hate having to look up the colors on the internet for what code changes something to what color, is their a simpler way i could go about finding the colors for the itemdef ints, somebody plz post a guide or something!

I know how to change item colors but i just hate having to look up the colors on the internet for what code changes something to what color, is their a simpler way i could go about finding the colors for the itemdef ints, somebody plz post a guide or something!
